Interface RoutingInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    A basic interface for all routing.

      • getRoute

        java.util.AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<java.lang.Byte,java.lang.Byte> getRoute(java.lang.Byte destination)
                                                                          throws RouteNotFoundException
        Gets the fastest route to a given destination.
        Parameters:
        destination - Destination to find route to.
        Returns:
        The last byte of the IP for the next hop and the hop count.
        Throws:
        RouteNotFoundException

      • isReachable

        java.lang.Boolean isReachable(java.lang.Byte node)
        Checks whether a node is still reachable.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to check the connection to
        Returns:
        True if the node still has a route.

      • getLongestRoute

        java.lang.Byte getLongestRoute()
        Returns the longest route in the entire network.
        Returns:
        The amount of hops the longest route takes.
